titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Herbert Oliver Brayer papers, 1803-1953 (Bulk 1871-1953)
titlestmt.author: Processed by Audrey J. Wilcox

publicationstmt.publisher: University of Wyoming. American Heritage Center.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Ann Mulfort January 2013

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Wyoming. American Heritage Center.

bioghist.head: Biography of Herbert Oliver Brayer
bioghist.p: Herbert Oliver Brayer (1913-) was an American historian during the twentieth century. An expert on the economic history of the American West, Brayer was born in Montreal, Canada and educated at the University of Southern California and the University of New Mexico. He served as Director of the Western Range Cattle Industry Study (1944-1949) and authored a number of books concerning the economic history of the American West, including "William Blackmore, A Case Study in the Economic Development of the West" (1949).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection contains Herbert Oliver Brayer's research files, including those concerning the Western Range Cattle Industry Study, economic history of the American West, and "William Blackmore, A Case Study in the Economic Development of the West" (which contain correspondence, manuscripts, clippings, notes, legal documents, photographs, photograph negatives, and soundscriber disks). Collection also contains Brayer's personal correspondence, speech and book review manuscripts, notes, and biographical material. Two unidentified reel to reel audio tapes, miscellaneous clippings, and class materials are in this collection as well.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no access restrictions on the materials for research purposes, and the collection is open to the public.

userestrict.head: Copyright Information
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for observing all copyright, property, and libel laws as they apply.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: There are two other known Herbert Oliver Brayer Collections preserved at the Colorado Historical Society Library and the Stanford University Department of Special Collections.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The collection was received from Herbert Oliver Brayer in 1948.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The collection was processed by Audrey J. Wilcox in February 2014.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Item Description, Box Number, Folder Number, Collection Name, Collection Number, American Heritage Center, University of Wyoming.
